Free Sound Resources for Pomodoro AI

How to Use These Sounds

Download the sounds that work best for your Pomodoro workflow, rename them to match the required filenames, and place them in your extension's sounds folder:

  • start.mp3 - Played when starting a Pomodoro session
  • break.mp3 - Played when a Pomodoro completes and a break begins
  • complete.mp3 - Played when a break ends

License Information

When using sounds from these resources, please be aware of the following license types:

  • Free for commercial use - Can be used in any project, including commercial ones.
  • Creative Commons 0 (CC0) - Public domain dedication, no attribution required.
  • Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) - Free to use but requires attribution to the original creator.

For sounds that require attribution, please include the appropriate credit in your extension's documentation or about page.
